Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Blue Sea Costa Verde in Playa de Palma (El Arenal), you'll be minutes from Aqualand and close to Port of El Arenal. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of El Arenal Beach and Palma Aquarium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 124 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Blue Sea Costa Verde, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Blue Sea Costa Verde, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Blue Sea Costa Verde in Playa de Palma (El Arenal), you'll be minutes from Aqualand and close to Port of El Arenal. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of El Arenal Beach and Palma Aquarium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Aqualand - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Port of El Arenal - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
El Arenal Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Palma Aquarium - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Maioris Golf Club - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Golf Son Gual - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Golf Park Puntiro - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Basilica of St. Francis - 12 km / 7.5 mi
Santa Eulalia Church - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Palma Town Hall - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Mallorca Cathedral - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Plaza Mayor de Palma - 12.3 km / 7.7 mi
Juan Miro Foundation - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Fundacion Juan March - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Parc de La Mar - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi

The preferred airport for Blue Sea Costa Verde is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Costa Verde Hotel is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi.
